Header: IMF approves another disbursement- Warns against budget deficit
Content: The International Monetary Fund has approved a disbursement of 164 million US dollars for Sri Lanka. The IMF completed the Sixth Review of Sri Lankaâ€™s economic performance yesterday under the program supported by an extended arrangement under the Extended Fund Facility. The IMF has completed the review with Sri Lanka despite missing a revenue target, saying fiscal discipline is critical as the island heads for a presidential election with candidates promising subsidies and tax cuts.
